name: Rovernaut
description:
Rovernaut is a very small Martian exploration game. Thrust into the shoes of a human explorer alone on Mars, you must navigate puzzles and platforms to help rebuild a damaged Mars Rover, whose components and months of research have been scattered across the landscape by a meteor strike of unprecedented proportions. With an atmosphere and an aesthetic that venerates the beauty of the otherworldly, combined with immersive and ambient gameplay, Rovernaut portrays in miniature the diversity and beauty of a world as unfamiliar to us as it is to our lonely astronaut.

 

 

Features:

    Explore the heights, depths, and natural extremes of an otherworldly and beautiful Mars.

    Collect Rover’s lost components and use them to your advantage in the quest to get Rover back to work.

    Dodge and outmanoeuvre curious environmental hazards; you don’t need enemies when the very planet is out to get you.

    Get lost in the atmospheric music and ambient sounds of an unexplored world 34 million miles away.
